featured.text: Almost as soon as a child receives shoes to wear, he/she is likely to have grown out of them.

Such is the case with an old leather shoe in a museum in Alaska.

other.text: After five years of research, she created from pineapple leaves a material which, like real leather, can be used for making bags, shoes, and 23 textile products.

definition.zh_def: 鞋子，通常用來保護和裝飾腳部的衣物。
definition.en_def: A covering for the foot, typically made of leather, canvas, or other materials, designed to protect and provide comfort.
definition.example: She bought a new pair of shoes for the party.
